extendedInfo.description: ========================================Killer Shooting Sniper X- top game for clear vision and sniper training, today for freeAim for the crotch for maximum pain and maximum points !!Shoot out their cigarette !!Blow off their hat !!And finish them with a head shot to the temple for maximum accuracy !!This is Killer Shooting Sniper X - top training game for clear vision and sniper style games, where your mission is to sniper shoot waves of bad guys on the run trying to kill your girl friend. A steady hand and careful aim are essential, but when things get tough, it calls for a mini gun !! it's gonna get messy :)Players who love shooting games like contract killer, call of duty, and battlefield will have a lot of fun with this game. Amazing, simple game play, extreme gore, and free to download.How to play:To aim, drag the crosshairs with one finger, and tap anywhere on the screen with another finger to shoot. Make sure to play using two fingers at the same time, this is a multi touch tap game. Shoot the killers in the centre of the head for a higher accuracy score. You can also get a high bonus score when you shoot off the bad guys arms, hats, cigarettes and crotch.New in this Version:- Blast those killers with the new rocket launcher- Share my score with friends on facebook- More blood splats and funny pain sounds- Links to all X Series gamesWords top 10 players (email us if you beat any scores here):1. Elmo 4 ladies man - 100000002. John L - 284263. Jib - 168784. Alex Water - 163785. Stephan Karaba - 156996. Kumar Muthusamy - 150467. Letty - 137278. Perry The Great - 137009. Nun - 1359610. Elme9 - 13579Some player reviews:"Sniping, machine guns, and all type of stuff u already know this is the game to get. Especially if u got kids that like guns and u want them out ur hair with buying them toy guns. Here is the solution. I give this 5 golden stars" - Louis C1122 (iPhone, August 2012)."This game is so simple, yet it is the greatest time killer I have seen since that game where birds that Are not HAPPY, get flung through the air via a Slingshot. I'm a Fan" - Hipster86 (iPhone, August 2012) Check out some video reviews online here: JDTecno: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NKWWLakJFQo BSapproved: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MUy-FlooCEg Completely free and hours of fun. Get Killer Shooting Sniper X- top training game for clear vision and sniper style games today.Happy Gaming :)The Cobalt Play team========================================

reviews.author: Lisa Gilmore

reviews.title: Good game but a lot of flaws
reviews.comment: Its a fun game but u cant get new weapons without friends that have this game or u have to download something and it takes way to long to reload and when the guys get close to your girlfriend u cant shoot in that location. More weapons and faster reloads and slower rate of targets would make it a great game
reviews.author: kenyon Harris

reviews.title: Not Free!!
reviews.comment: Give us the ability to upgrade weapons without having to pay. Its not a free game if you have to pay for or post about the game on FB in order to get a new game. Other than that it\'s really good.

reviews.title: BEST EVER
reviews.comment: my title may be misleading, it has a few problems, like on ios you cant get guns free so I can\'t use my ipod to get guns free on hear, also it has A LOT of adds but they are where you can ignore them. Other than that one of the best f2p games on my phone I\'ve seen in a while.

reviews.title: Refund
reviews.comment: I payed for the last rifle and the launcher but I can only access the weapon I DIDNT buy.  Would like a fix or a refund ASAP then I might give it the correct rating

reviews.title: Bad Carl
reviews.comment: Kind of like sideways Space Invaders.  Bad guys keep coming and you got to eliminate them until they over run you. The fee to upgrade to better weapons is nominal. Fun but gets boring quickly.
